# Stage 6-7 Python dependencies for Super-Goose external tools
# Install: pip install -r requirements-stage6.txt

# DSPy - Prompt optimization and signature compilation
dspy>=3.1.0

# Inspect AI - Evaluation harness
inspect-ai>=0.3.100

# Mem0 - Graph memory with Neo4j + Qdrant
mem0ai>=1.0.0

# Langfuse - Observability and tracing
langfuse>=2.0.0

# CrossHair - SMT-based contract verification
crosshair-tool>=0.0.100

# Semgrep - Static analysis policy enforcement
semgrep>=1.60.0

# PR-Agent - AI-powered PR review (Qodo)
pr-agent>=0.3.0

# Pydantic AI - Typed agent outputs
pydantic-ai>=0.1.0

# LangGraph - Stateful workflow orchestration
langgraph>=0.2.0

# ast-grep - Structural code search
# (installed via cargo/npm, not pip)

# Shared async dependencies
aiohttp>=3.9.0
httpx>=0.27.0

# Resource coordinator dependencies
asyncio-mqtt>=0.16.0
